item.title: Strange Problem? find one wrong thing in this code!
item.dc:creator: @lord_fear lord_fear
item.description:
@lord_fear wrote:

There is nothing different between the two snippets.
But you might wanna do this.

if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1637) { if (playerLevel[18] >= 40) { slayer = true; addSkillXP(130 * playerLevel[18], 18); } else { slayer = false; sendMessage("You need a slayer level of 40 to attack jellys."); } }

item.title: Strange Problem? find one wrong thing in this code!
item.dc:creator: @zamorak_lord zamorak lord
item.description:
@zamorak_lord wrote:

Okay here is it:

         this code did not work:

            if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1637) {
                if (playerLevel[18] >= 40) {
                    slayer = true;
                addSkillXP(130 * playerLevel[18], 18);
                } else {
                    slayer = false;
                    sendMessage(
                            "You need a slayer level of 40 to attack Jellys!"); 

             this code did work:

            if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1637) {
                if (playerLevel[18] >= 40) {
                    slayer = true;
                addSkillXP(130 * playerLevel[18], 18);
                } else {
                    slayer = false;
                    sendMessage(
                            "You need a slayer level of 40 to attack jellys.");

What is the problem with tthe first code
